parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[PositionWorld]], which is [[PositionASL]] of the model centre [0,0,0] of an object, rather than transformed [[boundingCenter]] or [[Oxygen_2_-_Manual#LandContact|LandContact]] vertices.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''getPosWorld''' object
</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> object: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [[PositionWorld]]
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_obj [[setPosWorld]] [[getPosWorld]] _obj;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value> <code>[[ATLToASL]] (_groundObj [[modelToWorld]] [0,0,0]) [[isEqualTo]] [[getPosWorld]] _groundObj; //true</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Wave height under a boat:<code>_h = ((boat [[modelToWorld]] [0,0,0]) [[vectorDiff]] [[getPosWorld]] boat) [[select]] 2;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getPosWorldVisual]], [[setPosWorld]], [[position]], [[getPosATL]], [[getPosASL]], [[getPosASLW]], [[visiblePosition]], [[visiblePositionASL]], [[getMarkerPos]], [[modelToWorld]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
